job_tasks.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the deployment and rollout of AI solutions, which is a core aspect of bringing models into production.
Indicates involvement in the development and creation of AI solutions, implying software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Managing cloud architecture for AI solutions involves software development principles for infrastructure and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy
job_tasks.justification: The term 'production-worthy' implies ensuring solutions are robust and ready for live environments, which falls under software development for production.
This phrase clearly indicates the software development task of deploying AI models into a production environment.
Mentioning LLMs (Large Language Models) points to working with and developing solutions based on generative AI models.
Focusing on scalability and security in deployment is a key aspect of MLOps.
Scaling applications is a core MLOps responsibility to ensure performance and availability.

soft_skills.phrase: Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role.
actively contribute to innovation within NN
investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company

classification.rationale: The job explicitly mentions working with LLMs, deploying AI solutions, and building new AI solutions, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on scaling applications and making them production-worthy further supports this classification, especially when considering the 'Evidence Profile' mentioning modeling and software development for generative AI.
